|brand = TP-LINK |model = TL-WN851N |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = PCI |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 0023 |subvendor_id = 168c |subdevice_id = 3079 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = TE7WN851N |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Atheros;AR5416; |chip2 = Atheros;; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/30/2008 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China
